treatment.description: Plants 4–40 cm; stems, leaves, and phyllaries densely villous to glabrate, eglandular (at least some hairs always perceptible on distal stems and on proximal portions of phyllaries). Leaf blades oblanceolate. Phyllaries 1-nerved, herbaceous or slightly tawny-indurate proximally; outer 0.8–1.2 mm wide proximally.

key_statement.statement: Plants 5–18(–30) cm; basal leaf blades oblanceolate (30–)60–100(–150) × 6–12 mm, apices obtuse to rounded
Plants 8–40 or 4–15 cm; basal leaf blades linear-oblanceolate to narrowly oblanceolate, 30–120(–350) × (1–)2–6(–9) mm, apices acute.
Plants (4–)8–40(–70) cm; basal leaf blades (30–)80–120(–350) × (1–)2–6(–9) mm; cypselae strigillose
Plants 4–15 cm; basal leaf blades (30–)40–90(–120) × (1–)2–4(–6) mm; cypselae strigillose only distally
